title: Intangible Cultural Heritage Digital Preservation and Utilization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and general understanding of cultural heritage
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning aimed at developing intangible cultural heritage education tools applicable to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design a digital documentation system for intangible cultural heritage using TEL tools.
Learners can analyze the linguistic characteristics of regionally specific intangible cultural heritage through collaborative projects.
Learners can implement multi-device content creation and sharing processes in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
